title: Akshata Madavi
text:
Currently pursuing MS in Software Engineering with Data Science focus. Previously worked as Senior Data Engineer at LTIMindtree, building scalable pipelines and optimizing analytics. Passionate about leveraging AI/ML for impactful data solutions.

Experience


Senior Data Engineer @ LTIMindtree

May 2023 – Mar 2025 | Pune, India
Migrated on-prem DBs to BigQuery for near real-time analytics (~10M records). Built event-driven pipelines processing 30GB inconsistent Excel data in <10 minutes with parallelism. Managed production orchestration with Google Workflows.



Data Engineer @ AI Adventures

Aug 2021 – Apr 2023 | Pune, India
Migrated Moodle to MySQL; enabled BI views driving +20% revenue. Improved insights on sales, retention, and curriculum performance through data engineering solutions.



Data Engineer @ STL

Jun 2018 – May 2021 | Pune, India
Developed near real-time pipelines from Oracle/SAP/Salesforce to BigQuery (~1TB processed). Built Tableau reports for scrap detection and DOE analysis to support manufacturing operations.




Education


San Jose State University (SJSU)

MS, Software Engineering (Data Science) | Aug 2025 – Present
Courses: Data Analytics, Data Mining, Recommender Systems, Enterprise Software Platforms



College of Engineering Pune (COEP)

BS, Computer Engineering | Aug 2014 – May 2018
Courses: Programming, Databases, Algorithms, Software Design




Projects


Philosophy‑based Recommender (LLMs + RAG)
Personalized mental‑wellness recommendations using LLMs and RAG over curated philosophical texts. Focus on prompt design, retrieval quality, and safety.


NYC Taxi Fare Prediction (30M rows)
Distributed PySpark ML pipeline, engineered geospatial/time features, trained GBTs, and tracked experiments with MLflow.


GCP Data Pipelines @ Scale
Event‑driven pipelines to migrate on‑prem to BigQuery (10M+ records) and process 30GB Excel inputs in minutes using parallelism.
